editDialog.title: Edit agent
editDialog.description: Make changes to your agent here. Click save when you're done.

form.instructionsPlaceholder: Enter the agent's instructions and behavior...

knowledgeBase.title: Knowledge Base
knowledgeBase.description: Configure which knowledge the agent has access to
knowledgeBase.disabledTooltip: To upload documents, an embedding model must be enabled.

mcpIntegrations.title: Integrations
mcpIntegrations.description: Connect external MCP servers to extend agent capabilities

errors.failedToConnect: Failed to connect integration. Please try again.
errors.failedToDisconnect: Failed to disconnect integration. Please try again.
errors.failedToLoad: Failed to load integrations. Please try again.

org.title: Share with organisation
org.descriptionOn: This agent is shared with all users of your organisation
org.descriptionOff: This agent is shared not with all users of your organisation

create.title: Share Agent with Organization
create.description: This will make the agent available to all members of your organization

delete.title: Remove Share
delete.description: This will remove access to the agent for all members of your organization
